title: Devil's Vengeance
description: I know she’s forbidden.I’ve been warned.But I’m in too deep.Hailee Archer was mine the minute I met her and there’s no way in hell I’m giving her up.Our club is at war, though, and her brother is our greatest ally. He’s made it clear he doesn’t want me anywhere near her. He’s threatened to walk away from our club if he doesn’t get what he wants.What he doesn’t know about me is that I’m a stubborn bastard. I will fucking fight to the bitter end for my family. He wants to threaten me? He can go right the fuck ahead. He doesn’t stand a chance.This story contains all the panty-melting sexiness and alpha goodness that Nina Levine books are known for.OUT NOW!
author: Nina Levine
